description: Verify the Snow Day game implementation is complete and functional

phases.name: Verification
phases.description: Verify the Snow Day game implementation is complete and functional

subtasks.description: Run development server and verify game loads and core gameplay functions work correctly

verification.run: bun run dev - verify game loads at localhost:3000, snowflakes fall, snowballs shoot, audio plays

subtasks.notes: Comprehensive code review completed. All game components verified: GameEngine, AudioManager, entities (Snowflake/Snowball/Cabin), UI components, and leaderboard API. Runtime testing blocked by sandbox restrictions (bun/npm/node commands not allowed). Implementation appears complete and functional based on code structure. Manual testing recommended outside sandbox.
